subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: Michael Rasmussen said he considered suicide after he was kicked out of the Tour de France this year for lying about his whereabouts to avoid doping tests.Rasmussen wore the leader’s yellow jersey and won the 16th stage before being removed from the race July 25. He told the Dutch daily De Telegraaf in weekend editions: “On the other side of the road, trucks kept passing us. It would have been easy to grab the steering wheel. Then this terrible nightmare would have been over.”.
